name: Shopping.io
description: Shopping.io is an online e-Commerce platform that allows you to purchase from major retailers such as Amazon, eBay, Walmart and Home Depot using more than 150 different cryptocurrencies. $SHOP has many features within Shopping.io's ecosystem : * Lock $SHOP to get more SHOPback on your purchases * Pay with $SHOP to get more benefits * Buy $SHOP directly on Shopping.io
